title: Got PBE access but I can not create an account.
body: I got PBE access after waiting over 2 years but I can not create an account. When I go to create my account, it just says application received.

replies.body: Same here, seems like an odd glitch.
You should be good to go now!
Happened to me too. Hopefully we can get someone on this

Hey slamor, 

There was a bug with the PBE sign up last night. The issue should be resolved. Go ahead and try to create your account. If you're still having issues, please let me know!
I was able to make a account finely
